title: Worst thing about Hearthstone
body: Making a completely Golden deck when your deck consists of at least 8 legendaries. On the bright side. Halfway there!

replies.body: Legendaries are useless if you can't get below rank 20....
If you can't get below rank 20 you should quit the game.
true dat, went back to play HS a few weeks back, played for 3 hours, was 18 using only basic deck.
